songs.title: Greater Love
songs.lyrics:
Listening to the voice
Of the one who sets me free
Tears running down my face
As I realize
What he's done for me

(Chorus)
Ooooooh yes I know
What it means
To be free
To be free

Oh they drove him down the road
And they nailed him to my cross
And the nails they drove into his hands
Shoud have been through mine
The blood flowed should have been mine

(Chorus)
